programme.desc: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are pleasantly surprised when theyre offered a brand new house. Until they discover its in a different state! The Mayor of Elmore has decided they are bringing down the real estate value of the entire town so the family have to prove that theyre upstanding members of the community.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: No matter what Gumball does, Carmen thinks she knows better. Gumball attempts to gain the moral high ground but fails... The only option left is to bring Carmen down to his level. 15 mins, U (2011) (CC)

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the kids find out that Moms life hasnt panned out exactly as shed hoped, they try to make her day a bit easier by taking on her chores. However, they accidentally grab her bucket list instead of her to-do list and end up attempting to tick off all of Nicoles life goals.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom wins Employee of the Month at the Rainbow factory, Richard feels like he is never celebrated for all the work he does at home. Nicole is suspicious of how much he actually does, but when Richard goes on strike, his important role in keeping things under control becomes painfully clear...

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After missing out on a chance to see the premiere of the new Robofrog movie trailer, the trio devises a plan to sneak into the theater and catch a glimpse before anyone else. However, when they accidentally damage the reel... theyre forced to fix it or fess up!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After reading a book about a mystical animal society in class, Clarence is inspired to round up local animals and recreate an animal world of his own, to cheer up his friend Percy. But will Percy take the game too far?

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: While shopping with his Mom, Clarence discovers Breehn hiding in a clothes rack. Under the guise of trying on new clothes for their moms they sneak out to find a local gameshow being hosted inside the Aberdale Mall.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.sub-title: Clarence Wendle and the Eye of Coogan
programme.desc: Clarence and a few other students find the crusty old journal of Coogan, filled with clues leading to a mysterious treasure. Clarence spearheads the team of treasure hunters to journey through the perils of Aberdale, seeking the lost Eye of Coogan.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Kelsey accepts a quest from the Elders of the Creek, but is she ready for her terrifying opponent?

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig vows to make the game of Four Square fun again.

programme.desc: Starfire vows to keep her new goldfish alive.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin realise Grandpa Louie has no friends on Elmore Plus, they feel bad. So they create one - called Muriel. However when Granny Jojo finds out Louie has been spending time online with another woman, Muriel not existing isnt going to stop her being destroyed.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Dad gives Larrys Hairdressers a bad review for saying hes bald, he gets offered a free haircut. This inspires Gumball and Darwin to go on a reviewing-spree across town, forcing Larry to give them stuff with the threat of a bad review. Just because the customer is always right doesnt mean that what theyre doing isnt wrong.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons receive an unmarked package in the mail. To distract themselves from the urge to open it, they all take turns to imagine what it might contain. To Mom it could mean financial freedom, to Gumball it could mean superpowers: to whoever its actually for, it means theyre not getting their package.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Miss Simian discovers a failed test from Gumballs past that brings down his grade point average. This means he has to retake kindergarten all over again, much to her delight. But by demoting him Miss Simian has inadvertently brought herself down, and theyre left with no choice but to team up if they want things back to normal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin discover the reason Dads diet wasnt working was that he was actually on ten diets: and eating a meal for each of them. They eventually manage to help him lose weight, but Richards newfound buffness also brings out his more obnoxious side.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball discovers that Rob, his old nemesis, is "neme-seeing" someone else now. Devastated that Rob has fallen out of hate with him, Gumball refuses to accept that his ex-nemesis has moved on and does his best to sabotage Robs blossoming relationship with his new foe, Banana Joe.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When they see the school bullies making fun of Sussie Gumball and Darwin decide to try and help her act less weird. They carefully observe her behavior and decide that the only thing they have to change is absolutely everything.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. He bans Granny JoJo from ever seeing Louis again. When the kids get caught sneaking Granny Jojo out of the house, Dad challenges Louis to a man-off to prove once and for all who is the man of the house?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Robinson accidentally lets slip how little he cares for Gumball and Darwin, they react by giving him the cold shoulder. Surprisingly Mr Robinson misses them and tries to win back their friendship. After a few failed attempts, Gumball and Darwin realise that Mr Robinsons heart is protecting him, so they give it an intense affection overload.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Elmore. As the kids go trick or treating we see what everyone in town is up to. The ghosts and ghouls are finding it increasingly difficult to scare children, and are only scaring part-time. Can Gumball and Darwin help them get their scare back?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumballs old BFF, Fuzzy, turns up on his doorstep. Darwin struggles to accept that there was someone before him and fails to contain his jealousy. But is Darwin right to mistrust Fuzzy? Does Fuzzy actually have sinister motives for reconnecting with his old BFF?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pete Puma hires The Looney Builders to build a roller disco for Looneyburg. Lola is new to roller skating, but doesnt want to take it slow and practice.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunias Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build "hog."

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesnt want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry leads an accident-prone scouting troop, earning badges and creating mayhem for Tom.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been strapped with Tom its entire life the talking shadow refuses to go back to the life he once had! When Toms shadow becomes a total nuisance to both Tom and Jerry, they must team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger are taking care of their "adorable" niece for the weekend. When Ginger goes to the store, Rick jokingly puts Spike in charge of keeping the kid safe. Spike takes his new job seriously, swearing nothing will happen to the baby. This, naturally, is where Tom and Jerry arrive to wreak havoc and make Spikes babysitting gig quite possibly his last!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After the witches fly off into the night, Tom chases Jerry into a room full of enchanted bottles. When Jerry tries to hide in one, he inadvertently releases a mischievous thousand-year old genie who grants him three wishes.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom finds Butch having a bath upstairs, he gives him the boot. Unfortunately, a ring around tub isnt the only thing the alley cats left behind because now the house is infested with fleas. Its war as Tom, Jerry and Spike must do something to get rid of these pesky little bloodsuckers.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippy has heard a rumour that the abandoned outpost the gang plans to visit is haunted so he brings his ghost detector goggles, just in case! Ella assures him that there are no such things as ghosts, but then odd things begin to happen.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ellas mom is a hall of fame Enceladus 500 race champion, and Ella wants to be just like her! She plans to skate, scooter race and geyser jump her way to a championship trophy!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy have been practicing their rock-climbing skills, so that they can tackle the recently formed, huge crater on Saturns moon, Enceladus. Ella, however, prefers relying on her space boots to get her to the top of the rock wall

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: How can one little golf ball cause a crater the size of a house? By hurtling through space - thats how! One little rock can cause a chain reaction by hitting bigger and bigger pieces.

programme.desc: When Mole goes to find Hedge in the Wild Woods without his glasses, the weasels play a nasty trick on him and Mole falls into a ditch with Hedge. How will they ever get out to find Badger and get Moles glasses fixed?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad boasts he can get to the seaside in his hot air ballon and be back in time for his grand dinner. He soon gets into trouble and crash lands in the Wild Woods. Trapped in the ropes and branches of trees, Toad is helpless to stop the weasels marching on Toad Hall.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad commissions a portrait of himself from Mrs Otter but cant keep still enough for her to paint him. Will there ever be a portrait of Toad hanging in Toad Hall?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Toad throws out an old chair, he immediately regrets it but the Weasels have now claimed it. Can Toad and his friends persuade them to return it to him?

programme.title: Toad and Friends

programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.desc: Toad commissions a portrait of himself from Mrs Otter but cant keep still enough for her to paint him. Will there ever be a portrait of Toad hanging in Toad Hall?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Toad throws out an old chair, he immediately regrets it but the Weasels have now claimed it. Can Toad and his friends persuade them to return it to him?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Badger finds an old dirty painting of the Riverbankers ancestors as a choir and Ratty offers to put a new choir together. Chief and Tinker wont let him Smudge join. Only a full restoration of the painting will reveal who really was in the The Wild Wood Warblers!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings shave ice from the icefield and whip it into granita, but the result is flavorless. He decides to make granita in an empty jar of Yummy so that the chocolate left over on the sides of the jar will flavor the dessert. Its delicious! The Lemmings, who consider it was their recipe, swap the chocolate granita with another one made in an old flowerpot with potting soil. The choco-granito race is off and running!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-loeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where theyd hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Kai tries to go talk to Finn to convince him to return to the heroes, but he is attacked by villains on the way and Multy comes to his rescue.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, theyll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, theyll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels. The Lemmings immediately try to get their paws on it, but Grizzy also covets the board as a table to set his TV-dinners down on.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: its been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs. For Grizzy, no question of touching the chocolate spread or sodas! Instead, to the Lemmings delight, the fridge transforms into an extreme exercise machine.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddys picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines - and soon enough, hes been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like hes cheating!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet - but it wont appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but its useless - he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm - yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesnt miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctors outfit with stethoscope - great Teddy - Ill give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece -featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy and Scooby discover their new favorite food as the group investigates the mystery of a scary wizard in a candy factory.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny get the day off from Lamput chasing, and receive a super important assignment: go to the train station, and pick up the Boss beloved mom. The Boss really needs to reassess his delegation choices.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss just happened to capture Lamput last night, so this morning hes on top of the world!! But disaster strikes; during his morning ablutions, the Boss makes a fatal slip of the clippers, and his glorious Tache goes tumbling to the bathroom tiles. Its a catastrophic turn of events for the poor old coot... turns out hes got a raft of deep-seated family issues wrapped up in that white crest of lip-fur. Kindly Lamput takes pity on the poor emasculated Bossman, and helps him sneak back into the lab and get his hands on the tache-restorative formula. It all goes well. Well... well ish. Boss is happy - he gets his glorious mo back. The catch is, literally everyone else does too. You dont really understand someone until youve walked a mile in their tache.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. Its really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, lets face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput likes nothing more than a pleasant evening watching the night sky for UFOs. The peaceful night is ruined, of course, by those pesky Docs. Which is a shame, because its the one night where a UFO actually appears. Of the aliens who emerge from the strange craft, one bears a striking resemblance to Skinny - and naturally theres a bit of a mixup. The alien gets to live life as a Doc at the Lab. Hes pretty good at it, too. Skinny has to make his way as the pilot of a spaceship. Hes pretty bad at it too. In the end, the foreign food is the last straw, and both parties agree to resume their old lives. Lamput goes back to watching the skies.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortuneteller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy who wishes to recover his couch tries to straighten up but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is delighted with his new "ship in a bottle" until it mistakenly ends up on a milkmans float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. The crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critters arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: An action-packed music video of The Looney Builders traveling across land, air, and sea to get the job done.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. Hes too powerful for the Batwheels to stop, but Buff finds a friendly solution to end the city shaking shenanigans.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom impulsively kicks Spikes beloved chew toy Ruggles over the fence and has to go get it back when he sees how heartbroken Spike becomes. Things get hard when Ruggles is adopted by an imaginative little girl Matalyn and Tom has to steal him back.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Huldie sends Tom and Jerry into the woods to find a baby dragon who they befriend on the way home. When Hildie tells them she plans on making a special baby dragon dinner Tom and Jerry work together to save him.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its Spikes birthday! Hes been counting down the days. Every year, Rick goes all out to make it special but not this one. He has forgotten. Seeing how sad Spike is, Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember. Unfortunately, their every effort backfires, making the pathetic pooch sorry he was ever born. This one ends happily, we promise.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny rock us with some groovy moves!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzys discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabins interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzys cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a racket game linked to a prize distributor on a gas station parking lot. The more times you hit the ball without letting it touch the ground, the bigger the prize. With a series of 1,000 consecutive exchanges, the prize is a giant jar of Yummy chocolate spread! Grizzy has no qualms about cheating to win, but the outcome against the Lemmings is never certain. For they have nerves of steel when the stakes are high.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he cant watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robots artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the babys parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoos refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedias instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzys liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas. The scheme works and Grizzy starts scratching himself frenetically. Nonetheless, the bear manages to counter their diversion and expulse the rodents. When they land on a sorcerers hut, the Lemmings take possession of a magic scepter that has the ability to temporarily shrink objects. Now microscopic-sized, the rodents return to the cabin to get their paws on the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings arent interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Mia and Kai have to infiltrate Enigmas base, taken over by the villains, to get it back and access the super computer.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Spike leaves Tom in charge of his boy Tyke only to discover upon his return that Tyke now behaves more like a cat than a dog.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom forced into driving a race car created by evil Dr. Otto terrorizes the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling comes to their rescue.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster whos laid back attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry battles Tom to save a crab from becoming the Duke and Duchess main course.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Dr Bigby creates a machine to turn back the hands of time for his beloved cat Wilson. Tom is trying to break into the lab to eat Jerry and Napoleon and accidentally gets mistaken for a young Wilson and is taken home. Tom must convince Dr. Bigby hes got the wrong cat! Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real Wilson who is a mean vicious cat.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities, one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV, Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car, his favorite she-bear would be interested in him. He decides to confiscate the Lemmings crate on wheels and give it a serious overhaul. The Lemmings have nothing against an upgrade, as long as they remain behind the wheel!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortuneteller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy who wishes to recover his couch tries to straighten up but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels. The Lemmings immediately try to get their paws on it, but Grizzy also covets the board as a table to set his TV-dinners down on.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net (despite it being her favorite) if shes going to help Batman stop the Riddler in his tracks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, theyll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, theyll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, theyll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Witch Hazel hires The Looney Builders to make her house look spooky for Halloween, but things get complicated when they use her off-limits magical things.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After a particularly rough cat and mouse fight, Jerry quits! Tom is stunned as he watches his little friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave. First, Jerry tries moving in next door but thats where Bruno lives. Jerry settles for the house on the other side of his old digs where a rather large, sedentary cat lives. At first, Jerry enjoys his unfettered access to the kitchen but it has its drawbacks: hes constantly having to expand the opening to his new hole because of his weight gain. He first looks to Spike for companionship but that doesnt end well. Then he actively seeks a new mouse-mate, but theres a lot of crazy mice out there, especially one named Mickey. Then Tom and Jerry catch a glimpse of each other through the windows of their adjacent houses. One thing leads to another and the chase thats been happening for decades, continues.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butchs tail.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom gets the hiccups, the witches decide that the only way to cure him is to scare him, so they banish him to the Wicked Forest of Very Scary Things. Unfortunately, there really isnt anything that frightening in, so they enlist Jerry to conjure up some scares - a task that hes only too happy to oblige, by taking full advantage of the situation.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse ends with Tom taking a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out. After a little first aid, Tom wakes up as a kung-fu master. Now Jerry, Tuffy and Spike must reverse whatever happened to Tom to make him so lethal, otherwise theyll live the rest of their lives getting Tom-Fud. Only problem? No one can get near him.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogres tooth, they warn Tom and Jerry not to touch it. Naturally, they both try to get the other one to touch it, until they accidentally both touch it and discover it has greater powers than they ever could imagine. Now, neither of them want to let it go!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick plans a big yard sale for the next morning, Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to find Tykes first puppy collar in the gear before its sold. Accidentally locked in the garage all night, Tom and Jerry end up battling with every yard sale toy, gadget, yard tool and houseware item at their disposal.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Glitchs arm shorts out, Ellas dad has the right tools to fix him. While hes at it, Dad shows off his latest creation, a Super Towing Arm. Slippy is impressed and Glitch is more than happy to try it on for size

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella is enlisted to pet sit Buttons, a friends dog, on the very day she has to finish a school project about Venus. She decides to take on both responsibilities at once by taking Buttons with her to the planet to capture the final piece of video footage she needs. When the thunder from the storms around Venus scare Buttons into accidentally detaching himself from his pod, he lands on the pla net and disappears. Ella and her friends search frantically on the hot planet but cannot find him. Its Buttons who finds Ella! Ella admits she shouldnt have taken her furry friend with her, but at least she learned new facts for her project!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys Dad insists he get rid of all his inventions to free up some space. Slippy cant bear to, so decides to store them on the dark side of Mercury.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: On Sedna, Ella and her friends discover the space probe Voyager 1. Ella takes the Golden Record from the probe and takes it to Mom who reveals that Ellas greatest grandfather recorded a greeting on it!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Human Day is Ellas favourite day of the year and she invites Madhu to join her family for dinner. Madhu wants to make a good impression and wonders how to prepare.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad volunteers to babysit Portly for the Otters only to find babysitting isnt as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Hedge normally hibernates but this year she is determined to see Christmas. Although shes not much use in decoration preparation, she is able to bring peace and understanding to all when there is a dispute over the Christmas Tree.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Tinker comes up with a cunning plan for herself and Chief to be delivered as a parcel into Toad Hall. But the journey there proves to be more much more arduous than she could possibly imagine.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Chief agrees to accompany Toad on a day trip out in the car but only if he can drive. Chiefs plan is to steal the car by throwing Toad out but his erratic driving sees them perched precariously over the river bank. Can they ever be friends now?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Hedge learns to play chess, she fails to win gracefully. Soon no-one will play with her!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration - and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, theres no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Glitchs arm shorts out, Ellas dad has the right tools to fix him. While hes at it, Dad shows off his latest creation, a Super Towing Arm. Slippy is impressed and Glitch is more than happy to try it on for size

programme.title: Karbikool
programme.desc: The bugs talk about what it means to be someones friend.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad volunteers to babysit Portly for the Otters only to find babysitting isnt as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Hedge learns to play chess, she fails to win gracefully. Soon no-one will play with her!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzys TV. But it doesnt take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: its an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Rangers cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzys feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Mia and Kai have to infiltrate Enigmas base, taken over by the villains, to get it back and access the super computer.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, theyll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a rollercoaster for Looneyburg. Bugs and Daffy soon get caught up trying to prove their part of the coaster is the best.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net (despite it being her favorite) if shes going to help Batman stop the Riddler in his tracks.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. Redbird must overcome his fear of taking baths if hes going to help Bam bring Clayface to justice.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbours pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a "date" to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their "relaxing" holiday!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero "Super Spy" and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gangs trip to be bayou is ruined by a shambling Swamp Beast thats scaring away anyone who dares to enter its soggy domain!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Boss is writing his new novel but he finds it extremely hard to focus with all the noise and disturbance at the lab. Looking for some tranquillity, Boss finally settles inside the old cannon at launch pad of the lab and accidentally gets fired out all the way to the moon!! Its completely quiet on the moon, just what Boss needs. He cant stop writing. Back at the lab, they build a rocket to bring Boss back! Hopefully boss gets to finish his novel first.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: For a blob of goo, Lamput sure has a big heart; the orange softie really cant sleep until the little spider nearby has help building its web. Good deeds go a long way, too - when a swarm of nasty mosquitos decides to prey upon the sleeping Lamput, the little spider goes above and beyond to protect its new orange bestie. The spider wins in the end, although theres a bit of a close call at one stage. Why did Lamput decide to go to bed right next to a thousand foot drop to certain doom? We may never know.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tired of the daily chores at home, Lamput buys a bottle of Super-Strength potion from a roadside salesman! A happy and super-strong Lamput now wraps up his chores with extra ease! When the Docs sneak up to catch him, they get accidentally knocked out by Lamput. Finally, the Docs realize Lamputs secret! They steal the biggest bottle of Super-Strength potion and pour it all over themselves. The Docs super-actions backfire and eventually land them in jail - all this with Lamput blissfully unaware of all that happened!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who is an Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become "inventive" himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost a cleverness competition, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Beans spirits.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town.
